import React,{useState} from 'react' import { Link,NavLink } from 'react-router-dom' import "./Navbar.css"; const Navbar = () => { const [isMenuOpen,setIsMenuOpen]=useState(false); const handleOpenMenu=()=>{ setIsMenuOpen(true) } const handleCloseMenu=()=>{ setIsMenuOpen(false) } return
  • Cinemas
  • Films
  • Events
  • Offers & Gifts
  • SignIn
  • SignUp
} export default Navbar
